import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnimatedIntroduction=()=>{const text=["Portfolionaire, our dedicated resume website, is a dynamic tool catering specifically to the students of our class."," This platform provides a centralized space for showcasing a comprehensive overview of skills, experiences, and achievements, empowering individuals to highlight their unique qualities.
